overview:
The Trevi Group is an international executive search firm that specializes in the unified communications, telecom, telepresence, and data center industries. The fields include sales, sales engineering, marketing, product management, development, and project management. We place individuals from the GM/VP level to manager level and provide permanent placements as well as professional contract staffing. ——————————————————————————— Website: www.TheTreviGroup.com Follow us on Twitter: www.twitter.com/KarelLukas Submit resumes: resumes@TheTreviGroup.com ——————————————————————————— The Trevi Group is part of the MRINetwork (www.mrinetwork.com) which has 1,000 worldwide. Our 25 years industry experience, global reach, and disciplined recruiting process will provide you with the top talent you need to succeed.

Specialties â–ª VP & Directors of Sales/Marketing â–ª Sales Executives / Account Managers â–ª Business Development â–ª Sales Managers â–ª Marketing â–ª Product Management â–ª Development â–ª Engineering â–ª Professional Services â–ª Project Management

(unified communications, UC, telepresence, wireless, telecom, VoIP, IPT, contact center, server, storage, video conferencing, MPLS, IP-VPN, data center, conferencing, collaboration, Call Manager, IPCC, Microsoft OCS, Cisco, Avaya, Nortel, EMC, CCIE, CCVP, CCNA, CRM)
